long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Column to Comma-Separated List Converter

Transform your column data into a comma-separated list effortlessly with the Column to Comma-Separated List Converter extension. Ideal for anyone working with data, this tool streamlines your workflow by automatically converting pasted column data into a comma-separated format, copying it to your clipboard, and displaying the number of rows convertedâ€”all in real-time.

Key Features:

Instant Conversion: Paste your column data, and the extension automatically converts it into a comma-separated list.

Auto Copy to Clipboard: The converted list is instantly copied to your clipboard, ready for immediate use.

Row Count Display: Keep track of your data with a live count of the rows converted.

How to Use:

1. Open the extension by clicking on the icon in your Chrome toolbar.
2. Paste or type your column data into the input field.
3. The extension will automatically convert the data, copy it to the clipboard, and display the comma-separated list along with the row count.

Simplify your data handling tasks with this easy-to-use extension, perfect for data analysts, marketers, and anyone needing quick data transformations.
